net.frozencode.jniolib.ssl

Class SSLChannel

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.nio.channels.spi.AbstractInterruptibleChannel
      • java.nio.channels.SelectableChannel
        • java.nio.channels.spi.AbstractSelectableChannel
          • java.nio.channels.SocketChannel
            • net.frozencode.jniolib.ssl.SSLChannel
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Closeable, java.lang.AutoCloseable, java.nio.channels.ByteChannel, java.nio.channels.Channel, java.nio.channels.GatheringByteChannel, java.nio.channels.InterruptibleChannel, java.nio.channels.NetworkChannel, java.nio.channels.ReadableByteChannel, java.nio.channels.ScatteringByteChannel, java.nio.channels.WritableByteChannel

    public final class SSLChannel
extends java.nio.channels.SocketChannel
    The SSLChannel class is a wrapper class which implements SSL using a provided SSLEngine over a SocketChannel. Note that it is not generally possible to register instances of this class with a Selector; however, registering the underlying channel while performing IO using the instance of this class should provide a workable solution. This class is thread-safe.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      SSLChannel(java.nio.channels.SocketChannel chan, javax.net.ssl.SSLEngine eng, java.util.concurrent.Executor exec)
      Constructs a new SSLChannel backed by a specified SocketChannel, using a specified SSLEngine for encryption/decryption, and optionally using a specified Executor to perform time intensive tasks.

    • Constructor Detail

      • SSLChannel

        public SSLChannel(java.nio.channels.SocketChannel chan,
                  javax.net.ssl.SSLEngine eng,
                  java.util.concurrent.Executor exec)
        Constructs a new SSLChannel backed by a specified SocketChannel, using a specified SSLEngine for encryption/decryption, and optionally using a specified Executor to perform time intensive tasks.
        Parameters:
        chan - a SocketChannel. Non-NULL.
        eng - an SSLEngine with its setUseClientMode() method previously called. Non-NULL.
        exec - the Executor to use for time intensive tasks, or NULL if tasks should be run by the calling thread.

      • needWrite

        public boolean needWrite()
        Returns true if this SSLChannel has data waiting to be written or has SSL handshake transactions pending.
        Returns:
        true if this.write() should be called, false otherwise.

      • renegotiate

        public void renegotiate()
                 throws javax.net.ssl.SSLException
        Begins the process of replacing the encryption keys for this SSLChannel. Note that this process is not guaranteed to complete before this method returns.
        Throws:
        javax.net.ssl.SSLException - if a problem was encountered while signaling the SSLEngine to begin a new handshake.
